div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2142 Selinunte, 1903 (952) Burial: c. 325 B.C.? (K) Contents: c. 20 AV Carthage Disposition: dispersed Ricci, Boll. di Num. 1903, inside back cover of May-June issue The date assumes that the coins really were gold and not high-grade electrum
